title: Doug Emhoff, Tim Walz take rapid fire from children; reveal favorite food, music
content: Kamala Harris's husband, Doug Emhoff, and Democrat nominee Tim Walz shared a light moment with their children in an Arizona cafe. They discussed their favorite music and food, mentioning artists like Springsteen and REM. They enjoyed cinnamon buns and urged everyone to participate in the elections, emphasizing the importance of voting.
summary: Kamala Harris's husband, Doug Emhoff, and Democrat nominee Tim Walz shared a light moment with their children in an Arizona cafe. They discussed their favorite music and food, mentioning artists like Springsteen and REM. They enjoyed cinnamon buns and urged everyone to participate in the elections, emphasizing the importance of voting.

title: Centuries old copy of US Constitution sells for $9 million at North Carolina auction
content: A rare 237-year-old copy of the US Constitution was sold for $9 million at a private auction by Brunk Auctions in North Carolina. This copy, discovered in Edenton, North Carolina, is one of only eight known to exist today. Accompanied by a letter from George Washington, it highlights the historical significance of the document.
summary: A rare 237-year-old copy of the US Constitution was sold for $9 million at a private auction by Brunk Auctions in North Carolina. This copy, discovered in Edenton, North Carolina, is one of only eight known to exist today. Accompanied by a letter from George Washington, it highlights the historical significance of the document.

title: Donald Trump earned money from overcharging Secret Service through Washington hotel, says report
content: House Democrats claim former President Trump charged exorbitant rates to the Secret Service for rooms at his hotel during his presidency, reportedly profiting from taxpayer funds and breaching the Domestic Emoluments Clause by accepting these payments. Evidence includes billing records revealing significant markups on room rates compared to standard prices.
summary: House Democrats claim former President Trump charged exorbitant rates to the Secret Service for rooms at his hotel during his presidency, reportedly profiting from taxpayer funds and breaching the Domestic Emoluments Clause by accepting these payments. Evidence includes billing records revealing significant markups on room rates compared to standard prices.

title: Unverified Reddit post claiming Kamala Harris said 'Oh my God, it's over' going viral
content: An unverified Reddit post claiming that Kamala Harris said 'Oh my God, it's over' -- after her Fox News interview -- went viral, though there is no confirmation about it and social media users claimed that it's possible that it's fake. The post writer claimed to be a friend of a person who was in the camera crew for the said interview and Kamala Harris was struggling.
summary: An unverified Reddit post claiming that Kamala Harris said 'Oh my God, it's over' -- after her Fox News interview -- went viral, though there is no confirmation about it and social media users claimed that it's possible that it's fake. The post writer claimed to be a friend of a person who was in the camera crew for the said interview and Kamala Harris was struggling.

title: Liam Payne seen arguing with mystery woman before death: Who is she?
content: "I’ll give you $20,000 dollars just because I can. I have $55 million and I like to help people," Liam Payne told a mystery woman with whom he was arguing at the hotel lobby hours before his death. The woman was speaking in Spanish and the hotel manager was translating it for Liam.
summary: "I’ll give you $20,000 dollars just because I can. I have $55 million and I like to help people," Liam Payne told a mystery woman with whom he was arguing at the hotel lobby hours before his death. The woman was speaking in Spanish and the hotel manager was translating it for Liam.

title: 'I'm going to see Murdoch': Trump says Fox should curb negative ads on him
content: Donald Trump expressed his discontent with negative political ads against him on Fox News and plans to ask Rupert Murdoch to remove them. Despite his regular appearances, Trump has criticized the network's coverage. Trump calls for a halt on negative ads for 21 days, citing their unfairness.
summary: Donald Trump expressed his discontent with negative political ads against him on Fox News and plans to ask Rupert Murdoch to remove them. Despite his regular appearances, Trump has criticized the network's coverage. Trump calls for a halt on negative ads for 21 days, citing their unfairness.

title: Trump doesn't like calls to deploy Nikki Haley: 'I'll do what I have to do'
content: Donald Trump's campaign is reportedly in discussions to bring former UN ambassador Nikki Haley on board to assist with his campaign in the final weeks before the election. Despite past conflicts and Haley's prior run against him, Trump acknowledges her efforts while expressing mixed feelings about the collaboration. ​​“But let me just tell you: Nikki Haley and I fought, and I beat her by 50, 60, 90 points. I beat her in her own state. … I beat Nikki badly,” Trump said.
summary: Donald Trump's campaign is reportedly in discussions to bring former UN ambassador Nikki Haley on board to assist with his campaign in the final weeks before the election. Despite past conflicts and Haley's prior run against him, Trump acknowledges her efforts while expressing mixed feelings about the collaboration. ​​“But let me just tell you: Nikki Haley and I fought, and I beat her by 50, 60, 90 points. I beat her in her own state. … I beat Nikki badly,” Trump said.

title: Trump again trying to silence Stormy Daniels with another hush money deal? Adult actor says this
content: Amid reports of Donald Trump attempting another hush money deal with Stormy Daniels ahead of the 2024 election, sources reveal his attorneys' offer to lower her owed defamation suit amount if she agrees to remain silent. This follows Trump's previous $130,000 payment to Daniels during his 2016 campaign. MSNBC obtained relevant documents confirming the new proposal.
summary: Amid reports of Donald Trump attempting another hush money deal with Stormy Daniels ahead of the 2024 election, sources reveal his attorneys' offer to lower her owed defamation suit amount if she agrees to remain silent. This follows Trump's previous $130,000 payment to Daniels during his 2016 campaign. MSNBC obtained relevant documents confirming the new proposal.

title: 'Prisoners won't return until ... ': Hamas leader Khalil Hayya confirms Yahya Sinwar's death
content: Hamas leader Khalil Hayya confirmed the death of Yahya Sinwar, emphasizing that Israeli hostages would only be released if hostilities in Gaza ended and Palestinian prisoners are freed. He stated Sinwar's death would strengthen the group's resolve. Over 42,500 have been killed in Israel's counterattacks following Sinwar's orchestrated assault on October 7.
summary: Hamas leader Khalil Hayya confirmed the death of Yahya Sinwar, emphasizing that Israeli hostages would only be released if hostilities in Gaza ended and Palestinian prisoners are freed. He stated Sinwar's death would strengthen the group's resolve. Over 42,500 have been killed in Israel's counterattacks following Sinwar's orchestrated assault on October 7.

title: 'White Dudes for Harris' replies to Trump's jibe, asks who 'Melania's boyfriend' is voting for
content: "Trump's former love is voting for @KamalaHarris. His wife is, too," the official X account of White Dudes for Harris said in a savage reply to Donald Trump's AI Smith dinner joke. “There’s a group called White Dudes for Harris…but I’m not worried about them…their wives and their wives’ lovers are all voting for me," Trump said in a jibe.
summary: "Trump's former love is voting for @KamalaHarris. His wife is, too," the official X account of White Dudes for Harris said in a savage reply to Donald Trump's AI Smith dinner joke. “There’s a group called White Dudes for Harris…but I’m not worried about them…their wives and their wives’ lovers are all voting for me," Trump said in a jibe.

title: How Hasina treated her critics; chilling accounts from secret underground jail in Bangladesh
content: Revelations about an underground jail in Bangladesh highlight the brutal methods used during Sheikh Hasina's regime. Critics were abducted, tortured, and often killed, with survivors held in the secretive 'Aynaghor.' Families of the disappeared continue to seek answers and justice for their lost loved ones.
summary: Revelations about an underground jail in Bangladesh highlight the brutal methods used during Sheikh Hasina's regime. Critics were abducted, tortured, and often killed, with survivors held in the secretive 'Aynaghor.' Families of the disappeared continue to seek answers and justice for their lost loved ones.

title: Who is Barron Trump's present girlfriend? Donald Trump says...
content: ​"I'm not sure he's there yet," Donald Trump said adding, "I don't think he's had a girlfriend yet". "He doesn't mind being alone, but he's somebody that gets along with people," Trump said. ​A lot of interest is there over Barron' love life and it all started a few years ago when TikToker Maddie claimed she dated Barron Trump when they studied together at Columbia Grammar and Preparatory School in New York. They were kids at that time and then Barron went to a different school leading to their break-up, as claimed by Maddie.
summary: ​"I'm not sure he's there yet," Donald Trump said adding, "I don't think he's had a girlfriend yet". "He doesn't mind being alone, but he's somebody that gets along with people," Trump said. ​A lot of interest is there over Barron' love life and it all started a few years ago when TikToker Maddie claimed she dated Barron Trump when they studied together at Columbia Grammar and Preparatory School in New York. They were kids at that time and then Barron went to a different school leading to their break-up, as claimed by Maddie.

title: Taiwan urges China to reconsider actions amid 'diehard independence separatists' reports
content: Taiwan's MAC has urged Beijing to rethink its approach after China's TAO received numerous tips through a system targeting 'diehard Taiwan independence separatists.' TAO's list, including Taiwan's Vice President, aims to punish these individuals to uphold national sovereignty. MAC calls for positive relations despite China's actions.
summary: Taiwan's MAC has urged Beijing to rethink its approach after China's TAO received numerous tips through a system targeting 'diehard Taiwan independence separatists.' TAO's list, including Taiwan's Vice President, aims to punish these individuals to uphold national sovereignty. MAC calls for positive relations despite China's actions.

title: Former Australian pilot Greg Lynn sentenced to 32 years for 'brutal' murder of Carol Clay
content: Former Jetstar pilot Greg Lynn received a 24-year prison sentence for murdering Carol Clay at a campsite in Victoria. Despite claiming self-defense during a struggle, the jury convicted him of Clay's brutal death. The attempt to cover up the murder and delay in revealing the body’s location added to the family's anguish.
summary: Former Jetstar pilot Greg Lynn received a 24-year prison sentence for murdering Carol Clay at a campsite in Victoria. Despite claiming self-defense during a struggle, the jury convicted him of Clay's brutal death. The attempt to cover up the murder and delay in revealing the body’s location added to the family's anguish.

title: Newfoundland residents discover strange 'white blobs' washing up on beaches
content: Residents of Newfoundland have discovered peculiar white blobs washing ashore along Placentia Bay. Locals describe them as doughy with a vegetable oil smell. Initial tests suggest they are plant-based, but their exact nature remains undetermined. The blobs' appearance has raised environmental and safety concerns.
summary: Residents of Newfoundland have discovered peculiar white blobs washing ashore along Placentia Bay. Locals describe them as doughy with a vegetable oil smell. Initial tests suggest they are plant-based, but their exact nature remains undetermined. The blobs' appearance has raised environmental and safety concerns.

title: China launches survey to understand 'fear of having children' amid declining birthrate
content: China is conducting a large-scale survey across 150 counties to understand public attitudes towards childbirth and address declining birth rates. Officials aim to use the insights for data-driven fertility support policies, promoting marriage and childbirth at appropriate ages, and ensuring shared parenting responsibilities.
summary: China is conducting a large-scale survey across 150 counties to understand public attitudes towards childbirth and address declining birth rates. Officials aim to use the insights for data-driven fertility support policies, promoting marriage and childbirth at appropriate ages, and ensuring shared parenting responsibilities.

title: FATF makes new listing criteria: Focus shifts to high-risk nations
content: The FATF has revised its criteria for listing countries to alleviate the burden on least developed nations while focusing on those posing greater threats to the global financial system. Nations will be prioritized based on membership, income level, and financial sector size, with additional support for low-capacity countries.
summary: The FATF has revised its criteria for listing countries to alleviate the burden on least developed nations while focusing on those posing greater threats to the global financial system. Nations will be prioritized based on membership, income level, and financial sector size, with additional support for low-capacity countries.

title: Liam Payne's death triggers probe: Drug abuse, hotel chaos, alcoholism, and ex-fiancé's allegations revealed
Taiwan president thanks air force for 'outstanding' work during China war games
content: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te commended the air force for its impressive performance during recent Chinese military exercises around Taiwan. Lai urged continued vigilance in guarding the Taiwan Strait. During the exercises, Taiwan detected a record 153 Chinese aircraft in a single day. Lai rejects Beijing's territorial claims and has repeatedly sought dialogue with China.
summary: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te commended the air force for its impressive performance during recent Chinese military exercises around Taiwan. Lai urged continued vigilance in guarding the Taiwan Strait. During the exercises, Taiwan detected a record 153 Chinese aircraft in a single day. Lai rejects Beijing's territorial claims and has repeatedly sought dialogue with China.

title: Musk warns of ‘Mad Max’ or ‘Zombie Apocalypse’ fate under Kamala Harris
content: Elon Musk urges Pennsylvanians to back Donald Trump, stating the election's critical impact on America and Western civilization. At a Philadelphia rally, he adopted Trump's rhetoric on border issues and election security while funding political campaigns with his super PAC. Musk's endorsement highlights a significant shift in his political support.
summary: Elon Musk urges Pennsylvanians to back Donald Trump, stating the election's critical impact on America and Western civilization. At a Philadelphia rally, he adopted Trump's rhetoric on border issues and election security while funding political campaigns with his super PAC. Musk's endorsement highlights a significant shift in his political support.
